enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
section_title: Report of the GEF to the COP
sentences: This item was first addressed at the SBI plenary on 29 November, at which time the Philippines, for the G-77/China, raised concerns about the new GEF Resource Allocation Framework and GEF co-financing requirements.
The contact group then discussed this issue beginning on 2 December until the SBI adopted a draft decision on 6 December.
The decision was adopted by the COP/MOP on 9 December.
